title: EasyKMS Windows Activator (XP-VISTA-7-8-10-2003-2008-2012-2016)
description:
Instructions:
1) Disable your antivirus.
2) Run EasyKMS.exe


Activate:
Lightweight one step activator for all Windows versions.

Windows XP (SP1-SP3)
Windows Vista (All)
Windows 7 (All)
Windows 8/8.1 (All)
Windows 10 (All)
Windows Server 2003
Windows Server 2008
Windows Server 2012
Windows Server 2016


Checksums:
CRC-32	2C87F1FC
MD-5	D2A581C3C1539E09D864F20D968C0E13
SHA-256	52002261388B3B3F38D387D0D6B78ED63F3E25752DB0B517669B345C372F94B5


Arguments:
/silent
Disables messages.


Antivirus:
Depending on your antivirus software you may need to exlude "C:Program Files (x86)Common FilesEasyKMS" folder from scan.


Notes:
Works with Virtual Machines.
Works with all Windows updates (up to date).
Does not require network connection.
No installer, start menu entries, etc.
Uses binaries from multiple third party activators like "AntiWPA" and "DazLoader" depending on your OS and activation status. Props to the original authors
